thread.section_title: zChocolat Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of zChocolat | www.zchocolat.com
thread.title: FRANCIS BEAULIEU

author: FRANCIS BEAULIEU
title: FRANCIS BEAULIEU
text:
Z-Chocolat expends great efforts towards the customer to ensure that a perfect experience is achieved....and Z Chocolat is successful in doing so. From the initial visit to the website , to the first taste of chocolate....and every aspect in between , my wife and I love this product and company.
We always know where our order is and when it will be delivered, and we KNOW that extra steps are ALWAYS made to keep us informed. No bad surprises....only good ones.
